answers.answer: With my first i lost my plug at 28weeks and was dilated to 2cm. Didn't have my son till 35weeks which was emergency c section due to preeclampsia.Im 33weeks with my second and i lost mine almost two weeks ago now.

I lost mine at 28 weeks. I'm now 38 weeks. I still haven't gone into labor yet. Some women lose theirs and go into labor soon and others still have weeks and weeks. Every pregnancy is different. Just make sure you tell your dr. But don't worry too much.

question: Wen did u lose ur mucus plug? And wen did u go after?The reason i ask is becuz i believe i lost mine and I'm only 34+2 weeks and I'm a lil scared that its to early.
